code:
// CampusAnon — Dark Mysterious Neon Design System
// Aesthetic: Deep space terminal meets luxury dating app

export const theme = {
  bg: '#080810',
  bgCard: '#0d0d1a',
  bgHover: '#12122a',
  bgSurface: '#111128',
  border: '#1e1e3f',
  neon: '#ff2d78',
  neonDim: 'rgba(255,45,120,0.15)',
  neonGlow: '0 0 20px rgba(255,45,120,0.4), 0 0 40px rgba(255,45,120,0.1)',
  neonGlowSm: '0 0 10px rgba(255,45,120,0.3)',
  cyan: '#00f5ff',
  cyanDim: 'rgba(0,245,255,0.1)',
  text: '#e8e8ff',
  textMuted: '#6666aa',
  textDim: '#3a3a6a',
  success: '#00ff88',
  error: '#ff4466',
  gradient: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #ff2d78, #ff6b35)'
};
const mono = "'Share Tech Mono', 'Courier New', monospace";
const sans = "'DM Sans', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif";
export const styles = {
  appWrap: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    minHeight: '100vh',
    fontFamily: sans,
    background: theme.bg,
    color: theme.text,
    backgroundImage: `radial-gradient(ellipse at 20% 50%, rgba(255,45,120,0.03) 0%, transparent 60%),
                      radial-gradient(ellipse at 80% 20%, rgba(0,245,255,0.03) 0%, transparent 60%)`
  },
  body: {
    display: 'flex',
    flex: 1
  },
  main: {
    flex: 1,
    overflow: 'auto'
  },
  loadingWrap: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    height: '80vh',
    fontSize: 16,
    color: theme.textMuted,
    fontFamily: mono,
    letterSpacing: 2
  },
  header: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    padding: '0 28px',
    height: 58,
    background: 'rgba(8,8,16,0.95)',
    backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)',
    borderBottom: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    position: 'sticky',
    top: 0,
    zIndex: 100,
    boxShadow: '0 1px 0 rgba(255,45,120,0.1)'
  },
  headerLogo: {
    fontSize: 18,
    fontWeight: 700,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    marginRight: 'auto',
    fontFamily: mono,
    color: theme.text,
    letterSpacing: 1,
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 8
  },
  headerNav: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: 2
  },
  navBtn: {
    background: 'none',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: 6,
    padding: '6px 14px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 13,
    color: theme.textMuted,
    fontFamily: sans,
    transition: 'all 0.2s'
  },
  navBtnActive: {
    color: theme.neon,
    background: theme.neonDim
  },
  headerRight: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 12,
    marginLeft: 20
  },
  aliasTag: {
    background: theme.neonDim,
    border: `1px solid rgba(255,45,120,0.3)`,
    padding: '4px 12px',
    borderRadius: 20,
    fontSize: 12,
    color: theme.neon,
    fontFamily: mono,
    letterSpacing: 1
  },
  logoutBtn: {
    background: 'none',
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 6,
    padding: '5px 12px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 12,
    color: theme.textMuted,
    fontFamily: sans,
    transition: 'all 0.2s'
  },
  sidebar: {
    width: 220,
    background: theme.bgCard,
    borderRight: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    padding: '24px 12px',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    gap: 2,
    flexShrink: 0
  },
  sidebarUser: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 12,
    padding: '4px 8px 20px',
    marginBottom: 4
  },
  sidebarAvatar: {
    width: 42,
    height: 42,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: theme.gradient,
    color: '#fff',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    fontSize: 18,
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontFamily: mono,
    boxShadow: theme.neonGlowSm,
    flexShrink: 0
  },
  sidebarAlias: {
    fontWeight: 600,
    fontSize: 13,
    color: theme.text,
    fontFamily: mono
  },
  sidebarGender: {
    color: theme.textMuted,
    fontSize: 11,
    marginTop: 2
  },
  sidebarDivider: {
    border: 'none',
    borderTop: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    margin: '10px 0'
  },
  sidebarItem: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    gap: 10,
    padding: '10px 14px',
    borderRadius: 8,
    border: 'none',
    background: 'none',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 13,
    textAlign: 'left',
    color: theme.textMuted,
    width: '100%',
    fontFamily: sans,
    transition: 'all 0.15s'
  },
  sidebarItemActive: {
    background: theme.neonDim,
    color: theme.neon,
    borderLeft: `2px solid ${theme.neon}`
  },
  sidebarStats: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: 6,
    marginTop: 8
  },
  statBox: {
    flex: 1,
    textAlign: 'center',
    background: theme.bgSurface,
    borderRadius: 8,
    padding: '10px 4px',
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',
    gap: 3,
    fontSize: 11,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    color: theme.textMuted
  },
  authWrap: {
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    flex: 1,
    padding: 24,
    minHeight: '85vh',
    background: 'linear-gradient(180deg, #080810 0%, #0a0820 100%)'
  },
  authCard: {
    background: theme.bgCard,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 16,
    padding: '44px 40px',
    width: '100%',
    maxWidth: 420,
    boxShadow: `0 0 0 1px rgba(255,45,120,0.05), 0 24px 80px rgba(0,0,0,0.6)`
  },
  authTitle: {
    fontSize: 26,
    fontWeight: 700,
    textAlign: 'center',
    marginBottom: 6,
    fontFamily: mono,
    color: theme.text,
    letterSpacing: 1
  },
  authSubtitle: {
    color: theme.textMuted,
    textAlign: 'center',
    marginBottom: 28,
    fontSize: 13,
    lineHeight: 1.5
  },
  infoBox: {
    background: 'rgba(0,255,136,0.08)',
    border: '1px solid rgba(0,255,136,0.2)',
    borderRadius: 8,
    padding: '12px 16px',
    marginBottom: 16,
    fontSize: 13,
    color: theme.success,
    lineHeight: 1.5
  },
  input: {
    display: 'block',
    width: '100%',
    padding: '11px 14px',
    marginBottom: 12,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 8,
    fontSize: 14,
    boxSizing: 'border-box',
    fontFamily: sans,
    background: theme.bgSurface,
    color: theme.text,
    outline: 'none',
    transition: 'border-color 0.2s'
  },
  label: {
    display: 'block',
    fontWeight: 600,
    fontSize: 12,
    marginBottom: 8,
    color: theme.textMuted,
    letterSpacing: 1,
    textTransform: 'uppercase'
  },
  genderRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: 8,
    marginBottom: 16
  },
  genderBtn: {
    flex: 1,
    padding: '9px 4px',
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 8,
    background: theme.bgSurface,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 12,
    fontFamily: sans,
    color: theme.textMuted,
    transition: 'all 0.15s'
  },
  genderBtnActive: {
    background: theme.neonDim,
    color: theme.neon,
    border: `1px solid rgba(255,45,120,0.4)`,
    boxShadow: theme.neonGlowSm
  },
  primaryBtn: {
    display: 'block',
    width: '100%',
    padding: '12px',
    background: theme.gradient,
    color: '#fff',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: 8,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 14,
    fontWeight: 700,
    marginTop: 8,
    textAlign: 'center',
    fontFamily: sans,
    letterSpacing: 0.5,
    transition: 'opacity 0.2s',
    boxShadow: theme.neonGlowSm
  },
  secondaryBtn: {
    display: 'block',
    padding: '9px 16px',
    background: 'none',
    color: theme.textMuted,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 8,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 13,
    marginTop: 6,
    fontFamily: sans,
    transition: 'all 0.15s'
  },
  authSwitch: {
    textAlign: 'center',
    marginTop: 18,
    fontSize: 13,
    color: theme.textMuted
  },
  authLink: {
    color: theme.neon,
    fontWeight: 600,
    cursor: 'pointer'
  },
  error: {
    color: theme.error,
    fontSize: 12,
    marginBottom: 8
  },
  page: {
    padding: '36px 44px',
    maxWidth: 960
  },
  pageTitle: {
    fontSize: 28,
    fontWeight: 700,
    marginBottom: 6,
    fontFamily: mono,
    color: theme.text,
    letterSpacing: 0.5
  },
  pageSubtitle: {
    color: theme.textMuted,
    marginBottom: 32,
    fontSize: 14
  },
  emptyState: {
    textAlign: 'center',
    padding: '80px 20px',
    color: theme.textMuted
  },
  matchBanner: {
    background: `linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255,45,120,0.15), rgba(255,107,53,0.1))`,
    border: `1px solid rgba(255,45,120,0.3)`,
    color: theme.neon,
    padding: '14px 20px',
    borderRadius: 10,
    marginBottom: 24,
    textAlign: 'center',
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontSize: 15,

  },
  discoverWrap: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexDirection: 'column',

    paddingTop: 8
  },
  profileCard: {
    background: theme.bgCard,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 20,
    padding: '40px 36px',
    width: 360,
    textAlign: 'center',
    transition: 'transform 0.4s ease, opacity 0.4s ease',
    boxShadow: '0 20px 60px rgba(0,0,0,0.5)',
    position: 'relative',
    overflow: 'hidden'
  },
  profileAvatar: {
    width: 88,
    height: 88,
    borderRadius: '50%',
    background: theme.gradient,
    color: '#fff',

    justifyContent: 'center',
    fontSize: 38,

  },
  profileAlias: {
    fontSize: 22,

    marginBottom: 6,
    fontFamily: mono,

  },

  },
  profileBio: {
    color: theme.textMuted,
    fontSize: 13,
    fontStyle: 'italic',
    marginBottom: 16,
    lineHeight: 1.6,
    borderLeft: `2px solid rgba(255,45,120,0.3)`,
    paddingLeft: 12,
    textAlign: 'left'
  },
  cardLiked: {
    transform: 'translateX(100px) rotate(12deg)',
    opacity: 0
  },
  cardPassed: {
    transform: 'translateX(-100px) rotate(-12deg)',
    opacity: 0
  },
  interestRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    flexWrap: 'wrap',
    gap: 6,
    justifyContent: 'center',
    marginBottom: 24
  },
  interestTag: {
    background: theme.cyanDim,
    border: `1px solid rgba(0,245,255,0.2)`,

    padding: '4px 12px',
    fontSize: 11,
    color: theme.cyan,
    fontFamily: mono,
    letterSpacing: 0.5
  },
  interestTagSm: {
    background: theme.cyanDim,

    fontSize: 10,
    color: theme.cyan,
    fontFamily: mono
  },
  actionRow: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: 16,
    justifyContent: 'center'
  },
  passBtn: {
    padding: '12px 32px',
    background: 'none',
    border: `1px solid rgba(255,68,102,0.4)`,
    color: '#ff4466',
    borderRadius: 30,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontSize: 14,
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontFamily: sans,
    transition: 'all 0.2s'
  },
  likeBtn: {

    border: 'none',

    fontSize: 14,
    fontWeight: 700,
    fontFamily: sans,

  },
  cardCounter: {
    marginTop: 20,
    color: theme.textDim,
    fontSize: 12,
    fontFamily: mono,
    letterSpacing: 1
  },
  matchGrid: {
    display: 'grid',
    gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fill, minmax(230px, 1fr))',
    gap: 20
  },
  matchCard: {
    background: theme.bgCard,
    border: `1px solid ${theme.border}`,
    borderRadius: 16,
    padding: 24,
    textAlign: 'center',

  chatListItem: {

  },
